accessToggle.public: Note will be visible to anyone with access to the document.
accessToggle.collaborator: Note will be visible to anyone who can edit this document.
accessToggle.private: Note will be visible to you alone.

dialogAccessDialog.changeAccess: Change access for {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}
dialogAccessDialog.selectAccess: Select an access level for the {n, plural, one {selected document} other {# selected documents}}
dialogAccessDialog.publicDesc: Anyone on the internet can search for and view the document.
dialogAccessDialog.verifiedHelp: Only verified users or members of verified organizations can make uploaded documents public. If you're a journalist or otherwise work in publishing vetted materials to inform the public, learn more and request verification here.
dialogAccessDialog.privateToOrg: You can’t change the access level to “Private to your organization” because {n, plural, one {this document is} other {one or more documents are}} associated with your individual account, not an organization. To add {n, plural, one {it} other {them}} to an organization, select {n, plural, one {it} other {them}} from the management view and click “Change Owner.” You can join or create an organization on this page.
dialogAccessDialog.privateDesc: Only people with explicit permission (via collaboration) have access.
dialogAccessDialog.organizationDesc: Only the people in your organization have access.
dialogAccessDialog.scheduleHelp: This document will be made public at the given date and time.  Publication time is local{timezone}.
dialogAccessDialog.unchanged: Access is unchanged. Select a different access level.
dialogAccessDialog.future: Must select a time in the future

dialogCollaboratorDialog.confirmMsg: Proceeding will remove {name} from {title}. Do you wish to continue?
dialogCollaboratorDialog.invite: Put in the email of an existing DocumentCloud user below. If they don't have an account, have them register here for free, and then ask them to log in to DocumentCloud at least once.
dialogCollaboratorDialog.adminHelp: Collaborators can edit this project and its documents
dialogCollaboratorDialog.editHelp: Collaborators can edit documents in this project
dialogCollaboratorDialog.viewHelp: Collaborators can view documents in this project
dialogCollaboratorDialog.empty: You have not yet added any collaborators to this project. Invite collaborators to grant other users access to the documents shared in this project. You can control whether collaborators have access to view/edit the project’s documents or be an admin with permissions to invite other users and edit the project itself.
dialogCollaboratorDialog.name: Name

dialogDataDialog.removeMsg: Proceeding will remove the {key}{value} data point from the specified documents. Do you wish to continue?
dialogDataDialog.addData: Add Data for {n, plural, one {Document} other {# Documents}}
dialogDataDialog.tagInfo: Add custom tags to categorize your documents.
dialogDataDialog.keyValueInfo: Add custom key / value pairs for precise categorization of your documents.
dialogDataDialog.keyInvalid: Keys can only contain letters, numbers, underscores (_), and dashes (-)
dialogDataDialog.emptyMsg: You have not yet added any data to the specified documents. Add tags and key/value pairs to categorize and organize your documents. You can filter and search on document data to give you powerful control over document management.

dialogDiagnosticDialog.staffOnlyInfo: Staff-only info for selected {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}
dialogDiagnosticDialog.title: Title

dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.respOnHelp: Fill the width of the article container (usually works best)
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.respOffHelp: The document will fit the sizes specified below
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.widthAuto: Will fill the available space if the document is set to responsive, otherwise defaults to 700px
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.widthFixed: Set a maximum width if the document is responsive, or set a fixed size if not responsive
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.heightAuto: The height is based on the size of the document, with no maximum size. If responsive, will be set to the height of the browser window minus 100px
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.heightFixed: Set a maximum height if the document is responsive, or set a fixed size if not responsive
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.sbResponsiveHelp: Show sidebar automatically on large screens and hide on mobile devices. In embed mode, the sidebar will be hidden
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.tVisibleHelp: Display the title and attribution in the header of the viewer
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.tHiddenHelp: Hide the title in the header of the viewer (still visible in the sidebar)
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.plVisibleHelp: Show a link to the raw PDF document in the sidebar
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.plHiddenHelp: Hide the sidebar PDF link (file is still accessible if the URL is known)
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.fsVisibleHelp: Show a fullscreen icon in the bottom-right corner
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.tmVisibleHelp: Show an option to view the document’s text in the view dropdown
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.cbfUserAndOrgHelp: Show a document’s attribution as the user name followed by the organization
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.cbfOrgOnlyHelp: Attribute the document to just the organization
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.embedDesc: Copy the HTML code to embed this document within an article

dialogDocumentInformationDialog.editInformation: Edit Information for {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}

dialogEditSectionsDialog.proceedingWillRemove: Proceeding will remove the specified section (p. {page} {title}). Do you wish to continue?
dialogEditSectionsDialog.manageSections: Manage sections to organize your document with a table of contents.
dialogEditSectionsDialog.empty: You have not added any sections
dialogEditSectionsDialog.title: Title
dialogEditSectionsDialog.updateTitle: Enter a new title or page number
dialogEditSectionsDialog.uniquePageNumber: You must enter a unique page number

dialogEmbedDialog.makingPublic: The document is currently being made public. This may take a minute or two.
dialogEmbedDialog.wouldMakePublic: Would you like to make this document public before sharing?
dialogEmbedDialog.notPublic: The document is not currently public. If you embed or link it, only you and collaborators will be able to view it until it is made public. Click below when you’re ready to publish this document to the public.
dialogEmbedDialog.selectShareHelp: Choose whether to share the entire document or just a page or note.
dialogEmbedDialog.shareDocHelp: Link or embed the entire document. (This is the most commonly used share option.)
dialogEmbedDialog.sharePageHelp: Link or embed a single page of the document. Useful for highlighting a page excerpt.
dialogEmbedDialog.shareNoteHelpHasNote: Link or embed a note within the document. Useful for highlighting a region of a page.
dialogEmbedDialog.shareNoteHelpNoNote: Once you add notes to the document, use this feature to link or embed them.

dialogNoteEmbedDialog.embedDesc: Copy the HTML code to embed this note within an article or post:

dialogPageEmbedDialog.embedDesc: Copy the HTML code to embed this page within an article or post:
dialogPageEmbedDialog.enterPageNumber: Enter the page number to embed:

dialogProjectAccessDialog.selectAccess: Select an access level below for {name} in {title}
dialogProjectAccessDialog.adminHelp: This collaborator can edit this project and its documents. The collaborator can invite users, delete users, and remove the project.
dialogProjectAccessDialog.editHelp: This collaborator can edit documents in this project but cannot edit the project itself.
dialogProjectAccessDialog.viewHelp: This collaborator can view documents in this project but cannot edit them or the project.
dialogProjectAccessDialog.invalidAccess: Access is already set to {access}. Select a different access level.

dialogOwnerDialog.changeOwner: Change owner for {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}
dialogOwnerDialog.accessWarning: Warning: You may lost access to the specified {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}} as a result of changing the document owner

dialogProjectDialog.deleteProject: Are you sure you want to delete this project ({project})?
dialogProjectDialog.title: Title...

dialogProjectEmbedDialog.embedDesc: Copy the HTML code to embed this document within an article or post:
dialogProjectEmbedDialog.cannotEmbed: Cannot embed this project, as it does not appear to exist.

image.error: An error occurred. Try refreshing the page

omniselect.noResults: No results. Click to clear filter.

shareOptions.errorText: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
shareOptions.addShortcode: Add this shortcode to your WordPress content —

specialMessage.contactUs: Contact us with bug reports, questions, and suggestions.

actionBar.selectDocs: Select some documents to reveal edit actions
actionBar.noPerms: You do not have permission to edit all of the selected documents

documents.mustBeVerified: You must be a verified journalist to upload documents

document.processingError: An error occurred trying to process your document

mainContainer.errorMsg: We could not reach the DocumentCloud server. Please try refreshing the page later.
